snippet.title: Introducing Bellular Studios
snippet.description:
Phew. It's finally time. Here's Michael talking to Thomas, the game's creative director and his partner in decade-long crime.
Wishlist The Pale Beyond now - https://bit.ly/TPB_Steam
Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/bellularstudios
While you're here, check out our website! https://bellular.games
